show.title: The Wake Up Call

title: Paul Craig Roberts
content:
His take on the future of civilization is very sobering. <!--more--> His perspective is icily logical; no qualifiers or excuses or false optimism.
This is a must-listen.
The nonsense about official claims of ‘economic growth’.
More falsified statistics on Global Warming designed to get you to ‘believe’.
Steve Liesman, CNBC’s Senior Economics Reporter, trots out the drivel about “the problem is that consumers are not taking on enough debt”.
Deep mental therapy for him is prescribed by Dr Martin.
The average lifespan of companies in the S&P used to be about 60 years in 1960, Now it’s 15-20 years.
The glut of empty residential real estate in China.
The recent, dreadful, ongoing recall scandal at GM.
How the government lies about the U3 unemployment rate.
